Moteur Multi-blog multi-utilisateur multilingue.

Version: 0.9

Instructions d'installation pour les nouveaux utilisateurs

Après avoit dézippé le fichier de distribution de b2evolution:

  1. Sur votre serveur, créez ou localisez une base de données mySQL pour b2evolution. (Par exemple, vous pouvez l'appeler "b2evolution")

    Note: Unless you changed the config, all tables created by b2evolution are prefixed with evo_ . Unless you already have an application using the same prefix, this makes it safe to install b2evolution in a database shared with other applications. Your existing tables will not be affected in any way.
  2. Téléchargez les fichiers de b2evolution sur votre serveur web.

    Note: Only the contents of the /blogs directory need to be uploaded to your site. If you want b2evolution to handle the homepage of your site, upload the contents of the /blogs folder to your website root. Otherwise, it's best to upload the files to a subdirectory of your webserver. You can keep the /blogs subdirectory name, but you can also choose another.
    Let's assume you install the contents of the blogs folder to http://yoursite.com/yourfolder ...
  3. Run the installation script on your server. It is located in http://yoursite.com/yourfolder/install and follow the instructions.

    The installer will ask you a few questions, create required database tables and configure b2evolution for you.
  4. Vérifiez que la nouvelle installation fonctionne.
  5. Sur les serveurs de production, il est recommandé de supprimer le sous répertoire /install.
  6. After basic install is done, there are a few tricky things you may need to take care of (online manual).
